definitions.text: concrete pavement is sometimes referred to as cement
examples: they stood on the grey cement beside the pool

definitions.text: a building material that is a powder made of a mixture of calcined limestone and clay; used with water and sand or gravel to make concrete and mortar
something that hardens to act as adhesive material
any of various materials used by dentists to fill cavities in teeth
a specialized bony substance covering the root of a tooth
make fast as if with cement
bind or join with or as if with cement
